00057 atomic_t Comm::ms_next_request_id = ATOMIC_INIT(1);

00062 Comm::Comm() {
00063   if (ReactorFactory::ms_reactors.size() == 0) {
00064     HT_ERROR("ReactorFactory::initialize must be called before creating AsyncComm::comm object");
00065     HT_ABORT;
00066   }
00067   ReactorFactory::get_reactor(m_timer_reactor_ptr);
00068   m_handler_map_ptr = ReactorRunner::ms_handler_map_ptr;
00069 }

00076 Comm::~Comm() {
00077 
00078   set<IOHandler *> handlers;
00079   m_handler_map_ptr->decomission_all(handlers);
00080   for (set<IOHandler *>::iterator iter = handlers.begin(); iter != handlers.end(); ++iter)
00081     (*iter)->shutdown();
00082 
00083   // wait for all decomissioned handlers to get purged by Reactor
00084   // (I think this is no longer needed, since the reactors should have been
00085   //  shut down before destroying the Comm layer)
00086   // m_handler_map_ptr->wait_for_empty();
00087 }

00093 int Comm::connect(struct sockaddr_in &addr, DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00094   int sd;
00095 
00096   if (m_handler_map_ptr->contains_handler(addr))
00097     return Error::COMM_ALREADY_CONNECTED;
00098 
00099   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP)) < 0) {
00100     cerr << "socket() failure: " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00101     exit(1);
00102   }
00103 
00104   return connect_socket(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr);
00105 }

00112 int Comm::connect(struct sockaddr_in &addr, struct sockaddr_in &local_addr, DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00113   int sd;
00114 
00115   if (m_handler_map_ptr->contains_handler(addr))
00116     return Error::COMM_ALREADY_CONNECTED;
00117 
00118   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP)) < 0) {
00119     HT_ERRORF("socket() failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00120     exit(1);
00121   }
00122 
00123   // bind socket to local address
00124   if ((bind(sd, (const sockaddr *)&local_addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0) {
00125     HT_ERRORF("bind() failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00126     exit(1);
00127   }
00128 
00129   return connect_socket(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr);
00130 }

00136 int Comm::listen(struct sockaddr_in &addr, ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr &chf_ptr) {
00137   DispatchHandlerPtr nullHandlerPtr(0);
00138   return listen(addr, chf_ptr, nullHandlerPtr);
00139 }

00154 int Comm::listen(struct sockaddr_in &addr, ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr &chf_ptr, DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00155   IOHandlerPtr handlerPtr;
00156   IOHandlerAccept *acceptHandler;
00157   int one = 1;
00158   int sd;
00159 
00160   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP)) < 0) {
00161     cerr << "socket() failure: " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00162     exit(1);
00163   }
00164 
00165 #if defined(__linux__)
00166   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00167     cerr << "setsockopt(TCP_NODELAY) failure: " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00168 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00169   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_NOSIGPIPE, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00170     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_NOSIGPIPE) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00171 #endif
00172 
00173   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00174     cerr << "setsockopt(SO_REUSEADDR) failure: " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00175 
00176   // bind socket
00177   if ((bind(sd, (const sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0) {
00178     cerr << "bind() failure: " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00179     exit(1);
00180   }
00181 
00182   if (::listen(sd, 64) < 0) {
00183     cerr << "listen() failure: " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00184     exit(1);
00185   }
00186 
00187   handlerPtr = acceptHandler = new IOHandlerAccept(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr, m_handler_map_ptr, chf_ptr);
00188   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_handler(acceptHandler);
00189   acceptHandler->start_polling();
00190 
00191   return Error::OK;
00192 }

00196 int Comm::send_request(struct sockaddr_in &addr, time_t timeout, CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr, DispatchHandler *responseHandler) {
00197   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00198   IOHandlerDataPtr dataHandlerPtr;
00199   Header::HeaderT *mheader = (Header::HeaderT *)cbuf_ptr->data;
00200   int error = Error::OK;
00201 
00202   cbuf_ptr->reset_data_pointers();
00203 
00204   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_data_handler(addr, dataHandlerPtr)) {
00205     HT_ERRORF("No connection for %s:%d", inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr), ntohs(addr.sin_port));
00206     return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00207   }
00208 
00209   mheader->flags |= Header::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST;
00210   if (responseHandler == 0) {
00211     mheader->flags |= Header::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE;
00212     mheader->id = 0;
00213   }
00214   else {
00215     mheader->id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_request_id);
00216     if (mheader->id == 0)
00217       mheader->id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_request_id);
00218   }
00219 
00220   if ((error = dataHandlerPtr->send_message(cbuf_ptr, timeout, responseHandler)) != Error::OK)
00221     dataHandlerPtr->shutdown();
00222 
00223   return error;
00224 }

00226 
00227 int Comm::send_response(struct sockaddr_in &addr, CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr) {
00228   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00229   IOHandlerDataPtr dataHandlerPtr;
00230   Header::HeaderT *mheader = (Header::HeaderT *)cbuf_ptr->data;
00231   int error = Error::OK;
00232 
00233   cbuf_ptr->reset_data_pointers();
00234 
00235   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_data_handler(addr, dataHandlerPtr)) {
00236     HT_ERRORF("No connection for %s:%d", inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr), ntohs(addr.sin_port));
00237     return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00238   }
00239 
00240   mheader->flags &= Header::FLAGS_MASK_REQUEST;
00241 
00242   if ((error = dataHandlerPtr->send_message(cbuf_ptr)) != Error::OK)
00243     dataHandlerPtr->shutdown();
00244 
00245   return error;
00246 }

00253 int Comm::create_datagram_receive_socket(struct sockaddr_in *addr, DispatchHandlerPtr &dispatchHandlerPtr) {
00254   IOHandlerPtr handlerPtr;
00255   IOHandlerDatagram *datagramHandler;
00256   int one = 1;
00257   int sd;
00258 
00259   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0)) < 0) {
00260     HT_ERRORF("socket() failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00261     exit(1);
00262   }
00263 
00264   // Set to non-blocking
00265   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00266 
00267   int bufsize = 4*32768;
00268   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize)) < 0) {
00269     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_SNDBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00270   }
00271   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize)) < 0) {
00272     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_RCVBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00273   }
00274 
00275   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0) {
00276     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_REUSEADDR) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00277   }
00278 
00279   // bind socket
00280   if ((bind(sd, (const sockaddr *)addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0) {
00281     HT_ERRORF("bind() failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00282     exit(1);
00283   }
00284 
00285   handlerPtr = datagramHandler = new IOHandlerDatagram(sd, *addr, dispatchHandlerPtr);
00286 
00287   handlerPtr->get_local_address(addr);
00288 
00289   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_datagram_handler(datagramHandler);
00290   datagramHandler->start_polling();
00291 
00292   return Error::OK;
00293 }

00295 
00299 int Comm::send_datagram(struct sockaddr_in &addr, struct sockaddr_in &send_addr, CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr) {
00300   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00301   IOHandlerDatagramPtr datagramHandlerPtr;
00302   Header::HeaderT *mheader = (Header::HeaderT *)cbuf_ptr->data;
00303   int error = Error::OK;
00304 
00305   cbuf_ptr->reset_data_pointers();
00306 
00307   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_datagram_handler(send_addr, datagramHandlerPtr)) {
00308     std::string str;
00309     HT_ERRORF("Datagram send address %s not registered", InetAddr::string_format(str, send_addr));
00310     HT_ABORT;
00311   }
00312 
00313   mheader->flags |= (Header::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST|Header::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE);
00314 
00315   if ((error = datagramHandlerPtr->send_message(addr, cbuf_ptr)) != Error::OK)
00316     datagramHandlerPtr->shutdown();
00317 
00318   return error;
00319 }

00326 int Comm::set_timer(uint64_t duration_millis, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00327   struct TimerT timer;
00328   boost::xtime_get(&timer.expireTime, boost::TIME_UTC);
00329   timer.expireTime.sec += duration_millis / 1000LL;
00330   timer.expireTime.nsec += (duration_millis % 1000LL) * 1000000LL;
00331   timer.handler = handler;
00332   m_timer_reactor_ptr->add_timer(timer);
00333   return Error::OK;
00334 }

00341 int Comm::set_timer_absolute(boost::xtime expire_time, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00342   struct TimerT timer;  
00343   memcpy(&timer.expireTime, &expire_time, sizeof(boost::xtime));
00344   timer.handler = handler;
00345   m_timer_reactor_ptr->add_timer(timer);
00346   return Error::OK;
00347 }

00352 int Comm::get_local_address(struct sockaddr_in addr, struct sockaddr_in *local_addr) {
00353   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00354   IOHandlerDataPtr dataHandlerPtr;
00355 
00356   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_data_handler(addr, dataHandlerPtr)) {
00357     HT_ERRORF("No connection for %s:%d", inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr), ntohs(addr.sin_port));
00358     return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00359   }
00360 
00361   dataHandlerPtr->get_local_address(local_addr);
00362 
00363   return Error::OK;
00364 }

00370 int Comm::close_socket(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00371   IOHandlerPtr handlerPtr;
00372 
00373   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->decomission_handler(addr, handlerPtr))
00374     return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00375 
00376   handlerPtr->shutdown();
00377 
00378   return Error::OK;
00379 }

00381 
00390 int Comm::connect_socket(int sd, struct sockaddr_in &addr, DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00391   IOHandlerPtr handlerPtr;
00392   IOHandlerData *dataHandler;
00393   int one = 1;
00394 
00395   // Set to non-blocking
00396   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00397 
00398 #if defined(__linux__)
00399   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00400     cerr << "setsockopt(TCP_NODELAY) failure: " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00401 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00402   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_NOSIGPIPE, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00403     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_NOSIGPIPE) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00404 #endif
00405 
00406   handlerPtr = dataHandler = new IOHandlerData(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr);
00407   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_handler(dataHandler);
00408 
00409   while (::connect(sd, (struct sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in)) < 0) {
00410     if (errno == EINTR) {
00411       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00412       continue;
00413     }
00414     else if (errno == EINPROGRESS) {
00415       dataHandler->start_polling();
00416       dataHandler->add_poll_interest(Reactor::READ_READY|Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00417       return Error::OK;
00418     }
00419     HT_ERRORF("connect() failure : %s", strerror(errno));
00420     exit(1);
00421   }
00422 
00423   dataHandler->start_polling();
00424 
00425   return Error::OK;
00426 }
